Dated O
September B-DATE
28 I-DATE
, I-DATE
2020 I-DATE
and O
captioned O
'Apology O
to O
Your O
Grace O
the O
Most O
Reverend O
Alexander B-PER
C I-PER
. I-PER
Ibezim' I-PER
, O
the O
letter O
reads O
in O
parts O
, O
"""" O
Our O
attention O
has O
been O
drawn O
to O
a O

of O

, O
titled O
'Awka O
Anglican O

, O
ex O
- O
knight O
in O
corruption O

. O

"""" O
Having O
now O
verified O
that O
story O
and O
the O
circumstances O
of O
its O
publication O
, O
we O
deeply O
regret O
that O
the O
story O
ever O
had O
to O
be O
so O
inappropriately O
, O
unnecessarily O
and O
improperly O
linked O
to O
Your O
Grace O
. O

"""" O
We O
are O
currently O
taking O
firm O
and O
appropriate O
internal O
measures O
to O
deter O
a O
repeat O
of O
this O

error O
which O
, O
we O
can O
assure O
you O
, O
was O
never O
borne O
out O
of O
any O
ill O
- O

towards O

and O
office O
of O
Your O

. O

"""" O
As O

, O
we O
have O

down O
the O
publication O
from O
our O

will O

publish O
an O

to O

in O

, I-DATE

edition O
, O

you O

. O

"""" O
As O

of O
your O
flock O
in O
the O
Province O
on O

Niger B-LOC
, O
we O
hold O
Your O

, O
and O

office O
you O
so O

occupy O
, O
in O
very O
high O
esteem O
and O
cannot O

allow O
any O

to O

these O
, O
for O
whatever O

. O

"""" O
We O
beg O

to O

our O

that O
there O

never O

of O

. O
"""" O

"""" O

have O

a O
different O

, O

Orient B-ORG

"""" O
he O

. O

A O
Facebook O
post O
by O
the O
Chief O
Press O
Secretary O
to O
Governor O
of O
Kogi B-LOC
State O
, O
Onogwu B-PER
Mohammed I-PER
, O
on O
Sunday B-DATE
explained O
that O
the O
suspected O
criminals O
turned O
the O
forest O
into O
Indian O
hemp O
farm O
. O

The O
post O
also O
revealed O
that O
the O
suspected O
bandits O
train O
special O
breed O
of O
dogs O
to O
ward O
off O
anyone O
coming O
into O
their O
territory O
, O
thus O
making O
the O
area O
inaccessible O
for O
security O
personnel O
. O

According O
to O
Onogwu B-PER
, O
during O
the O
raid O
, O
four O
of O
the O
bandits O
were O
arrested O
, O
while O
ten O
of O
their O
guard O
dogs O
were O
killed O
. O

The O
Chief O
Press O
Secretary O
, O
while O
quoting O
the O
Chairman O
of O
Okehi B-LOC
Local I-LOC
Government I-LOC
Area I-LOC
, O
Hon O
Abdulraheem B-PER
Ohiare I-PER
who O
led O
the O
operation O
, O
warned O
that O
Kogi B-LOC
State O
is O
a O
no O
go O
area O
for O
criminal O
elements O
. O
